languages.text: "Обычно я пою его лишь на поле битвы... Но славить Императора угодно в любой момент, если делаешь это искренне!"
"I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"
languages.original_text: "Обычно я пою его лишь на поле битвы... Но славить Императора угодно в любой момент, если делаешь это искренне!"

traits.locale_text: "I usually save it for the battlefield... but every moment is a good moment to praise the Emperor if one does it with all their heart!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I usually save it for the battlefield... but every moment is a good moment to praise the Emperor if one does it with all their heart!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est quelque chose que je réserve au champ de bataille, habituellement... mais il n'est jamais mal venu de louer l'Empereur si nous chantons avec sincérité ! »
languages.original_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est quelque chose que je réserve au champ de bataille, habituellement... mais il n'est jamais mal venu de louer l'Empereur si nous chantons avec sincérité ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Suelo reservarlos para el campo de batalla... ¡pero nunca es mal momento para alabar al Emperador si cantamos con sinceridad en nuestros corazones!».
languages.original_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"

traits.locale_text: «Suelo reservarlos para el campo de batalla... ¡pero nunca es mal momento para alabar al Emperador si cantamos con sinceridad en nuestros corazones!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这些颂歌我通常都是在战场上颂唱的……不过，只要我们发自内心地放声歌唱，无论什么时候都可以赞美帝皇！”
languages.original_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"

traits.locale_text: “这些颂歌我通常都是在战场上颂唱的……不过，只要我们发自内心地放声歌唱，无论什么时候都可以赞美帝皇！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「普段は戦場用に取っておくが…誠意を込めて歌えば、皇帝を賛美するのに適していない瞬間などない！」
languages.original_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"

traits.locale_text: 「普段は戦場用に取っておくが…誠意を込めて歌えば、皇帝を賛美するのに適していない瞬間などない！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Normalerweise habe ich mir das für das Schlachtfeld auf ... doch es gibt nie einen falschen Augenblick, um den Imperator zu preisen, wenn wir mit Aufrichtigkeit im Herzen singen!"
languages.original_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"

traits.locale_text: "Normalerweise habe ich mir das für das Schlachtfeld auf ... doch es gibt nie einen falschen Augenblick, um den Imperator zu preisen, wenn wir mit Aufrichtigkeit im Herzen singen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu normalde savaş alanlarına saklarım ama... Yürekten, içtenlikle ilahi okumak ve İmparator'a şükretmek için kötü bir an asla olamaz."
languages.original_text: "I normally save it for the battlefield... but there is never a bad moment to praise the Emperor if we sing with sincerity in our hearts!"
